div.p: Off-campus instruction only for the rest of the 2019-2020 year.
For more Information, Please Visit: Here

div.h4: Junior High Pom Squad Posted Date: 04/24/2020

div.p:
How to Pin ParentPortal Shortcut on Apple or Android Device
Open a browser on your device.
Browse to the district Ascender website. iPhone users will need to use the Safari browser. Android users . . .
Beginning Thursday (April 23, 2020), you may drop off all completed school work every Tuesday and Thursday. There will be a drop off box located by the front door of the elementary building. . . .
